channel.title: Feywild on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Feywild on tlake.io

item.title: Brigadier Taggart
item.description: Description An eladrin commander in the army of the Summer Court. Initially encountered by the Menagerie when they visited Lyra in the Summer Court as the forces of Winter were beginning to encroach.

item.title: Kellis MacCleod
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Kellis MacCleod One of two owners and proprietors of MacCleod’s, a well-respected tavern. Kellis tends to focus more on the acquisition of product and the distillation of moonshine, a liquor made from the actual light of the moon.

item.title: Kessil MacCleod
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Kessil MacCleod One of two owners and proprietors of MacCleod’s, a well-respected tavern. Kessil tends to focus more on the tavern itself and the operations thereof. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Caerwyn Cadogan
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Caerwyn Cadogan A tuathan from the Feywild–once friend and a guide to the realm, now enemy after his betrayal at the Court of Stars. Description Appearance A handsome, anthromorphic fox.

item.title: Oberon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Oberon Oberon, Lord of Beasts, consort of Queen Titania, and member of the Seelie Court. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Incensed by the assassination attempt on Queen Titania that left her comatose, Oberon has been leading an unending form of The Wild Hunt.

item.title: Queen Mab
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Queen Mab Archfey and queen of the Winter Court of the Feywild. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Queen Titania
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Queen Titania Archfey and queen of the Summer Court of the Feywild. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info While the party visited the Court of Stars, they witnessed an assassination attempt on Queen Titania which left her gravely injured.
